ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Title: Double-Blinded!!!
ComicInfo.Summary: Double-Blinded!!!: As Snake-Eyes, Storm Shadow (with Boris), and Cobra Commander follow their own leads about the Blue Ninjas, the Blue Ninjas strike back, killing Boris, and infiltrating Broca Beach with orders to kill the Commander via Revanche Robotics, their front company. The Commander finds out about the plot against his life when a returning Viper trooper finds his family dead in his home, and his uniforms missing, and it's reported by a Tele-Viper on scene. Meanwhile, Duke, Scarlett, and Stalker take some accrued leave time to help out Snake-Eyes, as Snake-Eyes is helped out by the Baroness.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:20:08. [Issue ID 928600]
ComicInfo.Characters: Boris (killed),Stalker,Blue ninja cyborgs [Dr. Tchen,Snake-Eyes,Cobra [Cobra Commander,G.I. Joe [Duke,Tele-Vipers,Scarlett,Dr. Mindbender,Storm Shadow (injured),Law,Viper troopers],Mainframe],undercover Cobra agents]
